commsys_simulator<gf4,errors_hamming>
# Version
4
# Analyze all decode iterations?
0
# Input source
uniform<int, vector>
## Alphabet size
2
# Communication system
commsys<gf4,vector>
# Version
1
# Single channel?
1
## Channel
qsc<gf4>
## Modem
direct_blockmodem<gf4,vector,double>
## Mapper
map_straight<vector,double>
## Codec
ldpc<gf4,double>
# Version
5
# SPA type (trad|gdl|gdl_cuda)
gdl_cuda
# Number of iterations
100
# Clipping method (zero=replace only zeros, clip=replace values below almostzero)
clip
# Value of almostzero
1e-38
# Reduce generator matrix to REF? (true|false)
0
# Length (n) 
1024
# Number of parity checks (m)
768
# Maximum col weight
2
# Maximum row weight
3
# Non-zero values (ones|random|provided)
random
# Random seed
0
# Column weights
1024
